short_summary: Solicitation for maintenance services for two technicians.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:  Solicitation was announced on February 16th, 2023, under the Task and Solutions Professional Services  supply arrangement for the Department of National Defense. The Royal Canadian Air Force requires two technicians to be sourced to conduct, loading and offloading operations for support of the RCAF. Please refer to the  attachment for detailed work requirements.
tags: tıkabama.numbertr happening March 6th, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Solicitation date Feb 16th, 2023.
full_summary:
### W0125-23WR09 TSPS Air Movement Technician
#### Contract Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3835660557
* **Purchasing Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**
	+ Name: Fraser, Alexa
	+ Email: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Bid Submission Requirements**
	+ Effectiveness of Bid Due Date: 2023-03-06 at 14:00:00 EST
	+ All bids submitted after 14:00:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.
* **Brief Description of Contract:**  
The Department of National Defence (DND), Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), 2 Air Movements Squadron (2 Air Movements), requires the services of up to two (2) Technicians delivered through the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) supply arrangement. The services will include but not be limited to, loading and offloading operations in support of RCAF.

#### Contract Details:
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31
* **Regions of Delivery:** Trenton, Ontario

#### Notice Conditions:
* **Request Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Trade agreements listed in **appendix A**

#### Supporting Documentation:
* This document contains the formal tender details for the contract "W0125-23WR09 TSPS Air Movement Technician".
* All tenderers are eligible to bid on the contract and answer any further queries.

**appendix A**
(Connection to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership et cetera...)
